Topic.Title: "Output all game to a text file" option grayed out

Posts.EditableText: Hi! I've just gotten started with Quest. I see the posibility of using it to create a sort of interactive solo sandbox rpg. One of the things I'd like to do is log all the game text as you play for posting later as a sort of emergent storytelling. For some reason, I can't turn on the "Output all game to a text file" option in the "Logging" tab. Has that been disabled for good? Thanks! -Alex
Posts.HTML:
Hi!

I've just gotten started with Quest. I see the posibility of using it to create a sort of interactive solo sandbox rpg. One of the things I'd like to do is log all the game text as you play for posting later as a sort of emergent storytelling.

For some reason, I can't turn on the "Output all game to a text file" option in the "Logging" tab. Has that been disabled for good?

Thanks!
-Alex

Posts.EditableText: It is greyed out when you're in the middle of playing a game. To enable it, start Quest on its own (from the Start menu), then go to the Options window before starting a game.
Posts.HTML: It is greyed out when you're in the middle of playing a game. To enable it, start Quest on its own (from the Start menu), then go to the Options window before starting a game.

Posts.EditableText: Ah, got it. Thanks for the fast reply!
Posts.HTML: Ah, got it. Thanks for the fast reply!
